DOC.brief_summary: This single-center , prospective , randomize , double blind , placebo control study . The aim study assess effect fish oil capsule pain intensity postoperative analgesic consumption patient knee replacement surgery . The study population adult refer knee replacement surgery due osteoarthritis knee .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Fish Oil Surgery Pain After Knee Replacement Patients : Randomized , Prospective , Double Blind , Placebo Control Trial
DOC.detailed_description: Primary outcome : Post surgical pain level analgesic use Secondary outcome : 1 . Pain level analgesic use six week 3 month surgery 2. ω3 incorporation blood cell membrane ( RBC ) 3 . Stress inflammation marker 4 . Rates postoperative complication Study Procedure : Enrolled patient randomly divide control group intеrvention group preoperative clinic visit . Each patient receive total 150 capsule ( 5 capsule per day ) accordingly randomize group . Patients treatment group receive Fish Oil capsule . Patients control group receive placebo capsule .
DOC.criteria: Patients refer knee replacement surgery due osteoarthritis knee Use steroid , NSAIDs two week surgery , antidepression drug , antiepileptic drug , coumadin Diabetic neuropathy Herpeszoster/ postherpetic neuralgia n3 supplement use
